FuncDef: This command configures the rate for ICMPv6 packet-too-big messages.

ParaDef.Info: Limits the number of packet-too-big messages issued per time frame specified in the seconds parameter. Values-10 to 1000.
Determines the time frame, in seconds, that is used to limit the number of packet-too-big messages issued per time frame. Values-1 to 60.
